response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I propose a deal at $12,000. This price not only ensures a fair return for me but also allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I trust this proposal will meet both our expectations. Let me know if you need any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
